mapper.select: SELECT guacamole_user_password_history.user_id, guacamole_user_password_history.password_hash, guacamole_user_password_history.password_salt, guacamole_user_password_history.password_date FROM guacamole_user_password_history JOIN guacamole_user ON guacamole_user_password_history.user_id = guacamole_user.user_id JOIN guacamole_entity ON guacamole_user.entity_id = guacamole_entity.entity_id WHERE guacamole_entity.name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY guacamole_user_password_history.password_date DESC LIMIT #{maxHistorySize}
